pages.text: The Hazardous EnViroment (HEV) suit is an advanced armor and hazmat suit. It is powered with RF and has no durability. Each piece also has a unique ability. The armor can also be dyed like leather armor for customization
The helmet negates all poison effects and reduces any amount of wither to wither I for 4 seconds.
The chestplate allows the wearer to have 'long jump'. This is a boosted jump distance while sprinting.
The leggings allows the wearer to jump 2.5 blocks and gives a 25% speed boost.
The boots gives the wearer step assist, reduces fall damage by 50% and reduces fall height by 4 blocks meaning the wearer can fall 7 blocks (instead of 3) without tacking damage.
